scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build --max_old_space_size=5120 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts build
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
